name: bipedal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
walking on two legs, or relating to this movement: He was fascinated by the giant, bipedal ape. The pelvis is central to the bipedal gait of humans. See
biped
More examplesFewer examplesThere have been sightings of a huge, upright bipedal ape.Some dinosaurs were capable of bipedal walking.Kangaroos developed bipedal locomotion long before we did.
